title: SHA1 Hash Calculation
description:
SHA1_STR the SHA1 hash can be calculated in a string. In the STR a

string is passed to the module, and a positive edge at input "RUN", the

calculation starts. DONE is immediately reset at startup, and after the pro￾cess is DONE is set to TRUE. Then, at the parameter HASH the actual cal￾culated HASH value is available. (See module SHA1-STREAM).
name: SHA1_Hash_Calculator

input.name: RUN
input.description: Positive edge input that starts the calculation.

input.name: STR
input.description: The string input for which the SHA1 hash will be created.

output.name: DONE
output.description: Indicates TRUE if calculations are complete.

output.name: HASH
output.description: The actual SHA1 hash value calculated from the input string.
